# bayesianVARs

Estimation of Bayesian vectorautoregressions with/without stochastic
volatility.

Implements several modern hierarchical shrinkage priors, amongst them
Dirichlet-Laplace prior (DL), hierarchical Minnesota prior (HM),
Horseshoe prior (HS), normal-gamma prior (NG),
$R^{2}$-induced-Dirichlet-decomposition prior (R2D2) and stochastic
search variable selection prior (SSVS).

Concerning the error-term, the user can either specify an
order-invariant factor structure or an order-variant cholesky structure.

# Installation

Install [CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/package=bayesianVARs) version:

``` r
install.packages("bayesianVARs")
```

Install latest development version directly from GitHub:

``` r
devtools::install_github("luisgruber/bayesianVARs")
```

# Usage

The main workhorse to conduct Bayesian inference for
vectorautoregression models in this package is the function
[`bvar()`](https://luisgruber.github.io/bayesianVARs/reference/bvar.md).

Some features:

- Prediction, plotting, extraction of model parameters and extraction of
  fitted values with the usual generic functions
  [`predict()`](https://rdrr.io/r/stats/predict.html),
  [`plot()`](https://rdrr.io/r/graphics/plot.default.html),
  [`coef()`](https://luisgruber.github.io/bayesianVARs/reference/coef.md),
  [`vcov()`](https://rdrr.io/r/stats/vcov.html) and
  [`fitted()`](https://rdrr.io/r/stats/fitted.values.html).
- Configure prior distributions with helper functions
  [`specify_prior_phi()`](https://luisgruber.github.io/bayesianVARs/reference/specify_prior_phi.md)
  and
  [`specify_prior_sigma()`](https://luisgruber.github.io/bayesianVARs/reference/specify_prior_sigma.md).

# Demonstration

``` r
set.seed(537)
# load package
library(bayesianVARs)

# Load data
train_data <-100 * usmacro_growth[1:237,c("GDPC1", "PCECC96", "GPDIC1", "AWHMAN", "GDPCTPI", "CES2000000008x", "FEDFUNDS", "GS10", "EXUSUKx", "S&P 500")]
test_data <-100 * usmacro_growth[238:241,c("GDPC1", "PCECC96", "GPDIC1", "AWHMAN", "GDPCTPI", "CES2000000008x", "FEDFUNDS", "GS10", "EXUSUKx", "S&P 500")]
                                   
# Estimate model using default prior settings
mod <- bvar(train_data, lags = 2L, draws = 2000, burnin = 1000, sv_keep = "all")

# Out of sample prediction and log-predictive-likelihood evaluation
pred <- predict(mod, ahead = 1:4, LPL = TRUE, Y_obs = test_data)

# Visualize in-sample fit plus out-of-sample prediction intervals
plot(mod, predictions = pred)
```

# Documentation

[bayesianVARs - Shrinkage Priors for Bayesian Vectorautoregressions in
R](https://bayesian.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/2312.pdf#SOFTWARE%20HIGHLIGHT)

# Package index

## All functions

- [`bvar()`](https://luisgruber.github.io/bayesianVARs/reference/bvar.md)
  : Markov Chain Monte Carlo Sampling for Bayesian Vectorautoregressions
- [`coef(`*`<bayesianVARs_bvar>`*`)`](https://luisgruber.github.io/bayesianVARs/reference/coef.md)
  : Extract VAR coefficients
- [`fitted(`*`<bayesianVARs_bvar>`*`)`](https://luisgruber.github.io/bayesianVARs/reference/fitted.bayesianVARs_bvar.md)
  : Simulate fitted/predicted historical values for an estimated VAR
  model
- [`my_gig()`](https://luisgruber.github.io/bayesianVARs/reference/my_gig.md)
  : Draw from generalized inverse Gaussian
- [`pairs(`*`<bayesianVARs_predict>`*`)`](https://luisgruber.github.io/bayesianVARs/reference/pairs_predict.md)
  : Pairwise visualization of out-of-sample posterior predictive
  densities.
- [`plot(`*`<bayesianVARs_bvar>`*`)`](https://luisgruber.github.io/bayesianVARs/reference/plot.bayesianVARs_bvar.md)
  : Plot method for bayesianVARs_bvar
- [`plot(`*`<bayesianVARs_fitted>`*`)`](https://luisgruber.github.io/bayesianVARs/reference/plot.bayesianVARs_fitted.md)
  : Visualization of in-sample fit of an estimated VAR.
- [`plot(`*`<bayesianVARs_predict>`*`)`](https://luisgruber.github.io/bayesianVARs/reference/plot.bayesianVARs_predict.md)
  : Fan chart
- [`posterior_heatmap()`](https://luisgruber.github.io/bayesianVARs/reference/posterior_heatmap.md)
  : Posterior heatmaps for VAR coefficients or variance-covariance
  matrices
- [`predict(`*`<bayesianVARs_bvar>`*`)`](https://luisgruber.github.io/bayesianVARs/reference/predict.bayesianVARs_bvar.md)
  : Predict method for Bayesian VARs
- [`print(`*`<bayesianVARs_bvar>`*`)`](https://luisgruber.github.io/bayesianVARs/reference/print.bayesianVARs_bvar.md)
  : Pretty printing of a bvar object
- [`print(`*`<bayesianVARs_predict>`*`)`](https://luisgruber.github.io/bayesianVARs/reference/print.bayesianVARs_predict.md)
  : Print method for bayesianVARs_predict objects
- [`print(`*`<summary.bayesianVARs_bvar>`*`)`](https://luisgruber.github.io/bayesianVARs/reference/print.summary.bayesianVARs_bvar.md)
  : Print method for summary.bayesianVARs_bvar objects
- [`print(`*`<summary.bayesianVARs_predict>`*`)`](https://luisgruber.github.io/bayesianVARs/reference/print.summary.bayesianVARs_predict.md)
  : Print method for summary.bayesianVARs_predict objects
- [`specify_prior_phi()`](https://luisgruber.github.io/bayesianVARs/reference/specify_prior_phi.md)
  : Specify prior on PHI
- [`specify_prior_sigma()`](https://luisgruber.github.io/bayesianVARs/reference/specify_prior_sigma.md)
  : Specify prior on Sigma
- [`stable_bvar()`](https://luisgruber.github.io/bayesianVARs/reference/stable_bvar.md)
  : Stable posterior draws
- [`` `[`( ``*`<bayesianVARs_coef>`*`)`](https://luisgruber.github.io/bayesianVARs/reference/sub-.bayesianVARs_coef.md)
  : Extract or Replace Parts of a bayesianVARs_coef object
- [`` `[`( ``*`<bayesianVARs_draws>`*`)`](https://luisgruber.github.io/bayesianVARs/reference/sub-.bayesianVARs_draws.md)
  : Extract or Replace Parts of a bayesianVARs_draws object
- [`summary(`*`<bayesianVARs_bvar>`*`)`](https://luisgruber.github.io/bayesianVARs/reference/summary.bayesianVARs_bvar.md)
  : Summary method for bayesianVARs_bvar objects
- [`summary(`*`<bayesianVARs_draws>`*`)`](https://luisgruber.github.io/bayesianVARs/reference/summary.bayesianVARs_draws.md)
  : Summary statistics for bayesianVARs posterior draws.
- [`summary(`*`<bayesianVARs_predict>`*`)`](https://luisgruber.github.io/bayesianVARs/reference/summary.bayesianVARs_predict.md)
  : Summary method for bayesianVARs_predict objects
- [`usmacro_growth`](https://luisgruber.github.io/bayesianVARs/reference/usmacro_growth.md)
  : Data from the US-economy
- [`vcov(`*`<bayesianVARs_bvar>`*`)`](https://luisgruber.github.io/bayesianVARs/reference/vcov.bayesianVARs_bvar.md)
  : Extract posterior draws of the (time-varying) variance-covariance
  matrix for a VAR model

### All vignettes

  Stochastic Volatility Using the \*\*R\*\* Package \*\*bayesianVARs\*\*
  (PDF)](https://luisgruber.github.io/bayesianVARs/articles/bayesianVARs-vignette.pdf):
